data.eml:eml: Two new species of Australian Eutarsopolipus (Acariformes: Podapolipidae) from Nurus medius (Coleoptera: Carabidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Seeman, Owen D. (2019): Two new species of Australian Eutarsopolipus (Acariformes: Podapolipidae) from Nurus medius (Coleoptera: Carabidae). Zootaxa 4647 (1): 134-153, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4647.1.12
